question.prompt: What is the principal (chief) question or concern you have regarding your current condition?
In your own words, please provide a brief narrative of the details of the problem for which you are requesting a second opinion:
What is the patient's diagnosis? (please provide exact diagnosis if known)
When was the diagnosis made?
What examinations (tests) were done to determine the patient's diagnosis? (choose all that apply)
If other, please describe in detail below:
When was the patient last examined by his/her physician for the current condition (one you are requesting a second opinion for)?
Is the patient?
Has patient experienced past hospitalizations
If yes, please provide additional information below:
Has the patient experienced any eye / vision problems in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the eye/vision problems including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
What type of eye / vision problems does patient experience?
If other, describe in detail below:
When did the eye/vision problems begin?
Does patient experience ptosis (drooping of eye lids)?
If yes, when did the ptosis begin?
Has patient undergone any surgical procedures for the eye problems?
If yes, please describe in detail below. Please be as specific as possible.
Has the patient experienced any hearing problems in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the hearing problems including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Does patient have a family history of seizures?
If yes, please provide details (which family member(s), type of seizures, etc.) below:
Does the patient experience seizure activity?
If yes, seizures can be categorized in many ways. Do you know the type of seizures the patient has?
If yes, what type of seizures does the patient have? (choose all that apply)
If other, describe in detail below:
Does the patient experience more than one type of seizure?
If yes, how many different types of seizures does the patient experience? (choose all that apply)
If other, please explain in detail:

In the space provided below, please describe in depth the different types of seizures patient experiences. Please be very specific in the description. For instance, if you checked that you have 3 different types, please describe all three types below: Please describe below the details of the seizure spells that patient experiences. Include the duration and the frequency of occurrences. If you are not aware of the specific details of the spells, please provide the information as described by witnesses (friends, family, etc.).
Does the patient experience seizure activity at a particular time a day?
If yes, please explain in detail below:
Is patient currently taking medications for seizures?
If yes, from the list below, choose those that patient is taking (choose all that apply)
Has patient been previously on seizure medications which he/she is no longer taking?
If yes, from the list below, choose those that you have taken in the past (choose all that apply)
Has the patient experienced head trauma in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the head trauma. Please provide as much information as possible:
Did patient lose consciousness when the head trauma occurred?
When did the head trauma occur?
Has the patient been diagnosed with any thyroid diseases in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the thyroid diseases below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did condition begin?
Has the patient been diagnosed with any vitamin deficiency disorders?
If yes, please explain details of the vitamin deficiency below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did condition begin?
Has the patient been diagnosed with Muscular Dystrophy (MD) in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the Muscular Dystrophy diagnosis below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did condition begin?
Has the patient been diagnosed with Diabetes Mellitus (DM) in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the diabetes diagnosis below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did condition begin?
Has the patient been diagnosed with Cerebellar Syndrome?
If yes, please explain details of the Cerebellar Syndrome below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did condition begin?
Has the patient been diagnosed with heart block?
If yes, please explain details of the Heart Block. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did condition begin?
Does patient have a Pacemaker?
If yes, when was Pacemaker inserted?
Has patient experienced speech difficulties?
If yes, please explain details of the speech difficulties below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced frequent infections?
If yes, please explain details of the infections below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced unexplained fevers?
If yes, please explain details of the fevers below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced brain infections such as meningitis, encephalitis in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the brain infections below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Does patient experience headaches?
If yes, please explain details of the headaches including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Does patient experience dizziness?
If yes, please explain details of the dizziness including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Does patient experience mood alterations?
If yes, please explain details of the mood alterations including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Does patient experience disorientation (not sure of his / her surroundings)?
If yes, please explain details of the disorientation including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Does patient experience limb weakness?
If yes, please explain details of the limb weakness exact location, frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has patient experienced any other weakness problems in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the weakness problems including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Does patient experience lack of coordination?
If yes, please explain details of the lack of coordination including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Does patient experience numbness and / or tingling throughout his/her body?
If yes, please explain details of the numbness / tingling including exact location, frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced any swallowing problems in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the swallowing problems including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Does patient experience migraine or severe headaches?
If yes, please explain details of the headaches including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Does patient experience other pain?
If yes, please explain details of the pain including frequency, exact location, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced any numbness or tingling in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the numbness / tingling including exact location, frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced any unsteadiness or falling in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the unsteadiness / falling including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced any tremors in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the tremors including frequency, location, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced any muscle cramping in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the muscle cramping including frequency, location, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced an inability to sweat in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the inability to sweat including frequency, duration, etc. below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient developed abnormal fat pads in the past?
If yes, please explain details of the abnormal fat pads below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Does the patient have any abnormal birth marks?
If yes, please explain details of the abnormal birth marks below. Please provide as much information as possible:
Has the patient experienced nausea and / or vomiting?
If yes, please explain details of the nausea and / or vomiting below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced diarrhea ?
If yes, please explain details of the diarrhea below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced constipation?
If yes, please explain details of the constipation below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced temperature intolerance?
If yes, please explain details of the temperature intolerance below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced abnormal urine odor ?
If yes, please explain details of the abnormal urine odor below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced abnormal body odor?
If yes, please explain details of the abnormal body odor below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced fatigability or exercise intolerance?
If yes, please explain details of the fatigability or exercise intolerance below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced sensitivity to fasting / need for overnight snack/meal?
If yes, please explain details of the sensitivity to fasting below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced abnormal socialization?
If yes, please explain details of the abnormal socialization below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced abnormal eye contact?
If yes, please explain details of the abnormal eye contact below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced odd behaviors or stereotypes?
If yes, please explain details of the odd behaviors or stereotypes below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced an absence of affection?
If yes, please explain details of the absence of affection below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced oppositional behavior?
If yes, please explain details of the oppositional behavior below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced hallucinations or psychosis?
If yes, please explain details of the hallucinations or psychosis below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced excessive tearfulness?
If yes, please explain details of the tearfulness below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced depressed moods?
If yes, please explain details of the depressed moods below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced inattention or hyperactivity?
If yes, please explain details of the inattention or hyperactivity below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced obsessive behaviors or compulsive thoughts?
If yes, please explain details of the obsessive behaviors or compulsive thoughts. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced sensory integration issues with touch, food, clothing or other textures?
If yes, please explain details of the sensory integration issues below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced pica (appetite for non-food substances such as coal, chalk, etc.)?
If yes, please explain details of the pica below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced incontinence of urine or stool?
If yes, please explain details of the incontinence below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient experienced frequent urinary tract infections (UTIs)?
If yes, please explain details of the urinary tract infections below. Please provide as much information as possible:
When did this symptom begin?
Has the patient been prescribed medication for his/her condition?
If yes, please complete below:
Does patient have family members with learning delay, cerebral palsy, autism, mental retardation, or developmental regression?
If yes, please describe in detail:
Does patient have family members with seizures, or epilepsy?
If yes, please describe in detail:
Does patient have family members with a history of SIDS or death at a young age?
If yes, please describe in detail:
Does patient have family members with migraine or severe headaches?
If yes, please describe in detail:
Does patient have family members with a history of psychiatric disease?
If yes, please describe in detail:
Does patient have family members with Multiple Sclerosis or Parkinson Disease?
If yes, please describe in detail:
Does patient have family members with cardiac (heart) disease starting at a young age?
If yes, please describe in detail:
Does patient have family members with strokes starting at a young age?
If yes, please describe in detail:
Does patient have family members with hearing loss starting at a young age?
If yes, please describe in detail:
Does patient have family members with vision loss starting at a young age?
If yes, please describe in detail:
Does patient have family members with short stature?
If yes, please describe in detail:
What has been recommended regarding the treatment of patient's current condition? ( medical management, stem cell treatment, gene therapy, surgery, etc.)
Which physician made this recommendation?

column_definition.label: Specialty (primary care physician, neurologist, neurosurgeon etc.)

question.prompt: Is there anything else you think would be helpful regarding patient's condition?
